title: nee than appa
sahitya:
nI tAn appA apAra krpAnidhE n  dEhi bhakti bhAgyam



anupallavi



nI tAn appA en pOl pEdai aDiyArkku AdhAra bh tan anAtha nAthan



caraNam



AdhAram ilanAiyinum nin-dATkanbil mA nIcanAyinumE ninaiyE ninanduruga

mA cArukEsi vaLLIsha mAshil vAgIsha vara kunjaradAsa vAsan
